name: mist-ball
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 50% chance to lower the target’s Special Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: Attacks with a flurry of down. May lower SP. ATK.
flavor_text.emerald: Attacks with a flurry of down. May lower SP. ATK.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A flurry of down hits the foe. It may also lower the foe’s SP. ATK.
